attributes.comment:
USCIS-2006-0044
Adjustment of the Immigration Benefit Application/ Petition and Biometric Fee
Schedule

I am the adoptive parent of one boy from China and in the process of adopting a
child from Vietnam. My husband and I also have 4 biological children. Our
motivation for adoption was to give a home to a child in need, but we are the ones
who have been blesssed, by becoming the parents of a wonderful little boy. When
recently informed that the fees would be increasing again, I was discouraged. So
many couples have told me they would adopt if not for the incredible costs. Let's
not make it worse. Let's do things to help REDUCE the cost of adoption so that
more families will be encouraged to step forward and help the orhans in our world
and so that we make it easier for those who are unable to have biological children
to become parents.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Kelly McCashen
